entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:02 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few showers changing to rain at times heavy this morning. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Amount 20 to 30 mm except 50 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain with risk of freezing rain. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing near noon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Showers. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers. High 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
